snippet: New releases are coming from French Montana (“Excuse My French”), Weekend (“Jinx”), New Years Day (“Victim to Villain”), Kim Walker-Smith & Skyler Smith (“Home”).
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews French Montana's Excuse My French, Weekend album Jinx, I'm Bad For Your from Eric Strickland and the B Sides, New Years Day release Victim to Villain and Kim Walker-Smith & Skyler Smith's debut album Home.
lead_paragraph: New releases are coming from French Montana (“Excuse My French”), Weekend (“Jinx”), New Years Day (“Victim to Villain”), Kim Walker-Smith & Skyler Smith (“Home”).

headline.seo: New Albums From French Montana, Weekend, New Years Day
headline.main: Songs for the Club, the Faithful and the Economically Oppressed
headline.print_headline: Songs for the Club, the Faithful and the Economically Oppressed
